resources.string: I am already starting to like you
Look at you waiting while I fetch the latest Android news for you. You\'re so patient and easy-going. Wow. I really like you.

string-array.name: dummy_article_names
string-array.item: A long, long article with some really uninteresting name
This might well be the last article in this list

resources.string: An interesting article title which is also a dummy text
“Oh hi, looking good today!\nLet me fetch your articles for you.”
“There are no new articles on the web. Just checked.”
“You can use your attractive fingers to select an article on the left.”
